name: Little Slam
description:
this project is cancelled. but you can access whole source code of this project in github : https://github.com/jwvg0425/LittleSlam

control
  • 1p : wasd - move, q - change player, f - shoot / block, g - pass / steal
  • 2p : ijkl - move, u - change player, ; - shoot / block, ' - pass / steal

you can change key settings in unity launcher.
